name: A. Alyona and Numbers
statement:
After finishing eating her bun, Alyona came up with two integers and .
She decided to write down two columns of integers the first column
containing integers from to and the second containing integers from to .
Now the girl wants to count how many pairs of integers she can choose,
one from the first column and the other from the second column, such
that their sum is divisible by .Formally, Alyona wants to count the
number of pairs of integers such that , and equals .As usual, Alyona has
some troubles and asks you to help.
